categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starfighter classes

nodes.text: Tempest Zero starfighters were a model of starfighter used by Tofen's Raiders, a group of ace pilots from the planet Valahari. During the Clone Wars, the Raiders used the fighters to fly countless sorties on behalf of the Confederacy of Independent Systems across the northern Separatist territories.

Tempest Zero starfighters were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. They were original created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in The Clone Wars 10, a 2009 comic book written by Henry Gilroy and Steven Melching, with illustrations by Brian Koschak.
